# Quickify: AI-powered learning platform
[![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2740%27%20height=%2740%27/%3e)![Maziar Foroudian](https://dynamicbusiness.com/ai-tools/quickify-ai-powered-learning-platform.html)Maziar ForoudianFebruary 17, 2025](https://dynamicbusiness.com/ai-tools/</author/maziarforoudian>)
[](https://dynamicbusiness.com/ai-tools/<https:/www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fdynamicbusiness.com%2Fai-tools%2Fquickify-ai-powered-learning-platform.html>)[](https://dynamicbusiness.com/ai-tools/<https:/twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Quickify%3A%20AI-powered%20learning%20platform%20https%3A%2F%2Fdynamicbusiness.com%2Fai-tools%2Fquickify-ai-powered-learning-platform.html%20via%20%40DynamicBusiness>)[](https://dynamicbusiness.com/ai-tools/<https:/api.whatsapp.com/send?text=Quickify%3A%20AI-powered%20learning%20platform%20https%3A%2F%2Fdynamicbusiness.com%2Fai-tools%2Fquickify-ai-powered-learning-platform.html>)[](https://dynamicbusiness.com/ai-tools/<https:/www.linkedin.com/sharing/share-offsite/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdynamicbusiness.com%2Fai-tools%2Fquickify-ai-powered-learning-platform.html>)[](https://dynamicbusiness.com/ai-tools/<https:/reddit.com/submit?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdynamicbusiness.com%2Fai-tools%2Fquickify-ai-powered-learning-platform.html%26amp%3Btitle%3DQuickify%3A%20AI-powered%20learning%20platform>)
As a business professional, you understand the importance of continuous learning and development within your organization. However, finding the right tools to facilitate this process can be a daunting task. This is where Quickify comes in – a powerful all-in-one tool that utilizes AI to create interactive online courses in seconds.
## Features
  * Create Instant Online Learning with AI: Quickify removes the need for design or coding skills, allowing you to generate courses effortlessly. Whether you’re onboarding new employees, conducting training sessions, or implementing internal marketing campaigns, Quickify streamlines the process and boosts engagement.
  * Customizable Courses: Upload a document or add some text, and watch Quickify generate a personalized course complete with interactive activities, points, and badges. From microcourses to longer educational programs, Quickify caters to various learning needs and timeframes.
  * Dedicated Portal: Quickify offers a secure, dedicated portal with enterprise-grade hosting that works seamlessly across all browsers and devices. You can easily add your branding and generate new AI images and assets for your projects.
  * Gamification: Make learning fun and engaging with Quickify’s gamification features. Points and badges incentivize users to complete courses, while integrated timers keep learners focused and motivated.
  * Variety of Activities: Quickify comes with 12 different activities, including Multiple Choice, Classify, Video, Sorting, Fill in the Blank, Matching, Conversation, and Situation. Each activity is designed to reinforce learning objectives and boost retention.
  * Analytics and Insights: Gain real-time data on user progress, completion rates, incorrect answers, and time spent in each course. Insights reports provide detailed performance results, allowing you to make informed decisions on course adjustments.
  * User Management: Easily manage your users to ensure compliance with your Quickify subscription plan. Deactivate users at any time and review individual performance in each course. You can also reset user course progress if needed.
  * Integration Options: Connect Quickify with Single Sign-On for simplified access or integrate with your existing HRIS or LMS systems for seamless data flow. Campaign options allow you to use Quickify as a key component of your marketing or sales strategies.


In conclusion, Quickify is a versatile tool that caters to businesses of all sizes and industries, from enterprise companies to retail businesses and industrial sectors. Its user-friendly interface, AI-powered features, and customizable options make it a valuable asset for driving learning innovation within your organization.
## Pricing
Quickify offers a Free plan with basic features, the Core plan for $49/month, the Grow plan for $149/month, and a Custom plan with tailored features. Yearly plans are available for a discount of up to 20%. Custom quotes can also be requested.
Visit [quickify.ai](https://dynamicbusiness.com/ai-tools/<https:/www.quickify.ai/?utm_source=DynamicBusiness.com&utm_medium=DynamicBusiness.com&utm_campaign=DynamicBusiness.com>) for more.

# Your next big idea starts at SmallBiz Week 2025
[![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2740%27%20height=%2740%27/%3e)![Australian Business Forum](https://dynamicbusiness.com/brand-account/your-next-big-idea-starts-at-smallbiz-week-2025.html)Australian Business ForumFebruary 17, 2025](https://dynamicbusiness.com/brand-account/</author/australian-business-forum>)
[](https://dynamicbusiness.com/brand-account/<https:/www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fdynamicbusiness.com%2Fbrand-account%2Fyour-next-big-idea-starts-at-smallbiz-week-2025.html>)[](https://dynamicbusiness.com/brand-account/<https:/twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Your%20next%20big%20idea%20starts%20at%20SmallBiz%20Week%202025%20https%3A%2F%2Fdynamicbusiness.com%2Fbrand-account%2Fyour-next-big-idea-starts-at-smallbiz-week-2025.html%20via%20%40DynamicBusiness>)[](https://dynamicbusiness.com/brand-account/<https:/api.whatsapp.com/send?text=Your%20next%20big%20idea%20starts%20at%20SmallBiz%20Week%202025%20https%3A%2F%2Fdynamicbusiness.com%2Fbrand-account%2Fyour-next-big-idea-starts-at-smallbiz-week-2025.html>)[](https://dynamicbusiness.com/brand-account/<https:/www.linkedin.com/sharing/share-offsite/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdynamicbusiness.com%2Fbrand-account%2Fyour-next-big-idea-starts-at-smallbiz-week-2025.html>)[](https://dynamicbusiness.com/brand-account/<https:/reddit.com/submit?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdynamicbusiness.com%2Fbrand-account%2Fyour-next-big-idea-starts-at-smallbiz-week-2025.html%26amp%3Btitle%3DYour%20next%20big%20idea%20starts%20at%20SmallBiz%20Week%202025>)
Running a small business isn’t easy. Rising costs, staffing shortages, and unpredictable markets can make it feel like you’re constantly putting out fires. 
But what if you could step away from the daily grind for a day or two and gain the insights, strategies, and connections needed to future-proof your business? That’s exactly what [SmallBiz Week 2025](https://dynamicbusiness.com/brand-account/<https:/bit.ly/42PLVMN>) is all about. 
From 29-30 April at the Melbourne Convention & Exhibition Centre, Australia’s largest B2B event for SMEs is back and bigger than ever**–** giving you more opportunities to connect, learn, and grow. Whether you’re looking to streamline your operations, boost profitability or harness new technologies, SmallBiz Week is designed to help you navigate the challenges ahead with confidence. 
## **Why you can’t afford to miss SmallBiz Week 2025**
SmallBiz Week is your opportunity to immerse yourself in a dynamic environment filled with expert insights, innovative solutions, and meaningful connections that can propel your business forward. You can expect to walk away with: 
  * **Smarter strategies for growth** – Learn from industry experts on how to scale your business, implement new digital strategies and stay ahead in an evolving market. 
  * **The latest tools and solutions** – Explore cutting-edge innovations from industry-leading exhibitors offering practical, scalable solutions designed to help SMEs thrive, from AI-driven marketing tools to financial management platforms. 
  * **Workshops that deliver real impact** – Gain practical insights from expert-led sessions covering digital transformation, talent acquisition, funding opportunities, sustainable business practices and more. 
  * **Connections that matter** – Expand your professional network, meet potential partners, and gain valuable mentorship from those who’ve been in your shoes. 


## **The reality for SMEs, and how to stay ahead**
If you’re a small-medium sized business owner and feeling the pressure, you’re not alone. Recent data shows that 1 in 4 Australian SMEs fear insolvency if they lose a client or supplier. With insolvency rates rising, global trade instability, and an increasingly competitive market, businesses must be proactive to survive and thrive. 
According to the ScotPac SME Growth Index Report, many small businesses are struggling to keep up with escalating costs, while staffing shortages continue to put pressure on operations. Meanwhile, global tensions and shifting trade policies add another layer of uncertainty – especially for businesses reliant on imports and exports. 
As a result, competition is fiercer than ever. 
With these pressures mounting, many SMEs are looking for ways to innovate and future-proof their businesses. SmallBiz Week 2025 will provide attendees with practical strategies to navigate these uncertainties. 
Key themes will include: 
  * **Harnessing AI and Emerging Technologies** to streamline operations and improve customer engagement. 
  * **Adapting to a Changing Workforce** by exploring new approaches to talent acquisition and employee retention. 
  * **Financial Resilience and Growth Strategies** to help SMEs manage rising costs and access funding opportunities. 
  * **Sustainable Business Practices** to align with evolving consumer expectations and regulatory requirements.


“SmallBiz Week is more than just an event – it’s a game-changer for small businesses,” says Ray Evans, CEO of the Australian Business Forum. “In today’s rapidly evolving business landscape, SMEs need access to the right resources and connections to remain competitive.” 
## **Backed by industry leaders**
SmallBiz Week is backed by leading industry sponsors, including Employment Hero, Cloudstaff, IKEA for Business, Constant Contact, Thryv Australia, VentraIP, OneMusic Australia, and more. Their support underscores the importance of fostering a thriving SME ecosystem in Australia and they know that when small businesses succeed, we all win. 
## **Your next big idea starts here – Register today**
So, what’s your next move? Whether you’re a startup founder, an established business owner, or an aspiring entrepreneur, SmallBiz Week 2025 is your gateway to new opportunities. The breakthrough that takes your business to the next level could be one conversation, one connection, or one insight away. **SmallBiz Week 2025** is where those breakthrough moments happen – don’t miss your chance to be part of it. Attendance is free, but spaces fill up fast. Register here to be part of the conversation. . **[Register now](https://dynamicbusiness.com/brand-account/<https:/bit.ly/42PLVMN>)**.

![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2750%27%20height=%2750%27/%3e)![Australian Business Forum](https://dynamicbusiness.com/brand-account/your-next-big-idea-starts-at-smallbiz-week-2025.html)

Your next big idea starts at SmallBiz Week 2025

Australian Business Forum

February 17, 2025

Running a small business isn’t easy. Rising costs, staffing shortages, and unpredictable markets can make it feel like you’re constantly putting out fires. 

But what if you could step away from the daily grind for a day or two and gain the insights, strategies, and connections needed to future-proof your business? That’s exactly what SmallBiz Week 2025 is all about. 

From 29-30 April at the Melbourne Convention & Exhibition Centre, Australia’s largest B2B event for SMEs is back and bigger than ever – giving you more opportunities to connect, learn, and grow. Whether you’re looking to streamline your operations, boost profitability or harness new technologies, SmallBiz Week is designed to help you navigate the challenges ahead with confidence. 

Why you can’t afford to miss SmallBiz Week 2025 

SmallBiz Week is your opportunity to immerse yourself in a dynamic environment filled with expert insights, innovative solutions, and meaningful connections that can propel your business forward. You can expect to walk away with:  

  • Smarter strategies for growth – Learn from industry experts on how to scale your business, implement new digital strategies and stay ahead in an evolving market. 
  • The latest tools and solutions – Explore cutting-edge innovations from industry-leading exhibitors offering practical, scalable solutions designed to help SMEs thrive, from AI-driven marketing tools to financial management platforms. 
  • Workshops that deliver real impact – Gain practical insights from expert-led sessions covering digital transformation, talent acquisition, funding opportunities, sustainable business practices and more.  
  • Connections that matter – Expand your professional network, meet potential partners, and gain valuable mentorship from those who’ve been in your shoes. 

The reality for SMEs, and how to stay ahead 

If you’re a small-medium sized business owner and feeling the pressure, you’re not alone. Recent data shows that 1 in 4 Australian SMEs fear insolvency if they lose a client or supplier. With insolvency rates rising, global trade instability, and an increasingly competitive market, businesses must be proactive to survive and thrive.  

According to the ScotPac SME Growth Index Report, many small businesses are struggling to keep up with escalating costs, while staffing shortages continue to put pressure on operations. Meanwhile, global tensions and shifting trade policies add another layer of uncertainty – especially for businesses reliant on imports and exports. 

As a result, competition is fiercer than ever.  

With these pressures mounting, many SMEs are looking for ways to innovate and future-proof their businesses. SmallBiz Week 2025 will provide attendees with practical strategies to navigate these uncertainties. 

Key themes will include: 

  • Harnessing AI and Emerging Technologies to streamline operations and improve customer engagement. 
  • Adapting to a Changing Workforce by exploring new approaches to talent acquisition and employee retention. 
  • Financial Resilience and Growth Strategies to help SMEs manage rising costs and access funding opportunities. 
  • Sustainable Business Practices to align with evolving consumer expectations and regulatory requirements.

“SmallBiz Week is more than just an event – it’s a game-changer for small businesses,” says Ray Evans, CEO of the Australian Business Forum. “In today’s rapidly evolving business landscape, SMEs need access to the right resources and connections to remain competitive.” 

Backed by industry leaders  

SmallBiz Week is backed by leading industry sponsors, including Employment Hero, Cloudstaff, IKEA for Business, Constant Contact, Thryv Australia, VentraIP, OneMusic Australia, and more. Their support underscores the importance of fostering a thriving SME ecosystem in Australia and they know that when small businesses succeed, we all win. 

Your next big idea starts here – Register today  

So, what’s your next move? Whether you’re a startup founder, an established business owner, or an aspiring entrepreneur, SmallBiz Week 2025 is your gateway to new opportunities. The breakthrough that takes your business to the next level could be one conversation, one connection, or one insight away. SmallBiz Week 2025 is where those breakthrough moments happen – don’t miss your chance to be part of it. 
Attendance is free, but spaces fill up fast. Register here to be part of the conversation. . Register now.

# SilkChart: Sales call analytics tool
[![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2740%27%20height=%2740%27/%3e)![Maziar Foroudian](https://dynamicbusiness.com/ai-tools/silkchart-sales-call-analytics-tool.html)Maziar ForoudianFebruary 17, 2025](https://dynamicbusiness.com/ai-tools/</author/maziarforoudian>)
[](https://dynamicbusiness.com/ai-tools/<https:/www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fdynamicbusiness.com%2Fai-tools%2Fsilkchart-sales-call-analytics-tool.html>)[](https://dynamicbusiness.com/ai-tools/<https:/twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=SilkChart%3A%20Sales%20call%20analytics%20tool%20https%3A%2F%2Fdynamicbusiness.com%2Fai-tools%2Fsilkchart-sales-call-analytics-tool.html%20via%20%40DynamicBusiness>)[](https://dynamicbusiness.com/ai-tools/<https:/api.whatsapp.com/send?text=SilkChart%3A%20Sales%20call%20analytics%20tool%20https%3A%2F%2Fdynamicbusiness.com%2Fai-tools%2Fsilkchart-sales-call-analytics-tool.html>)[](https://dynamicbusiness.com/ai-tools/<https:/www.linkedin.com/sharing/share-offsite/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdynamicbusiness.com%2Fai-tools%2Fsilkchart-sales-call-analytics-tool.html>)[](https://dynamicbusiness.com/ai-tools/<https:/reddit.com/submit?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdynamicbusiness.com%2Fai-tools%2Fsilkchart-sales-call-analytics-tool.html%26amp%3Btitle%3DSilkChart%3A%20Sales%20call%20analytics%20tool>)
SilkChart is a powerful business tool designed to help sales teams analyze sales calls and improve playbook adoption. Unlike traditional call recording tools, SilkChart goes a step further by providing insights and actionable feedback to both sales managers and reps. With features tailored specifically for B2B SaaS sales teams, SilkChart aims to optimize team performance and help individual sellers become more effective in their roles.
## Features
  * Playbook: SilkChart allows teams to improve sales playbook adoption by choosing from proven playbooks or creating their own. Track playbook adoption for each rep and across calls, and use personalized scorecards to help reps address areas for improvement.
  * Insights: Optimize meeting performance by comparing reps’ responses to preferred answers, providing specific feedback for each call, and identifying key phrases that lead to successful conversions.
  * Team Analytics: Review more calls in less time with automatic call and rep surfacing, instant alerts for potential risks, and customizable summaries for each call.
  * AI Coach: Scale coaching across the team with AI-generated feedback for each call, including “What you could have said” suggestions to increase conversion rates.
  * Deal Health: SilkChart surfaces signals of deal health based on call analysis to help sales teams identify risks early and make informed decisions.
  * Built for B2B SaaS: SilkChart is the first sales call analysis tool tailored to the needs of B2B SaaS sales teams, providing benchmarks and insights specific to this industry.
  * Seamless Integrations: Enjoy effortless workflow with seamless integrations with calendars, meeting recording, and delivery of insights to email, Slack, or CRM.
  * For Sales Managers: Optimize team performance and save time with SilkChart’s comprehensive analysis and actionable insights.
  * For Individual Sellers: Improve sales skills and enhance performance with personalized recommendations and feedback from SilkChart.


In conclusion, SilkChart is a valuable tool for sales teams looking to enhance their sales call analysis, improve playbook adoption, and increase conversion rates. With its AI-powered coaching, team analytics, and deal health insights, SilkChart offers a comprehensive solution for optimizing sales performance in the B2B SaaS industry. Consider integrating SilkChart into your sales process to streamline operations, identify key opportunities for improvement, and ultimately drive success in your sales efforts.
## Pricing
Starter plan: Free, includes unlimited calls and viewers, 10 calls per month. Pro plan billed annually at $19 per user/mo, includes unlimited calls, advanced team collaboration features. Enterprise plan for scaling teams, customized pricing with additional features like CRM integration and dedicated account manager.
Visit [silkchart.com](https://dynamicbusiness.com/ai-tools/<https:/www.silkchart.com/?utm_source=DynamicBusiness.com&utm_medium=DynamicBusiness.com&utm_campaign=DynamicBusiness.com>) for more.
Keep up to date with our stories on [LinkedIn](https://dynamicbusiness.com/ai-tools/<https:/www.linkedin.com/company/6613983>), [ Twitter ](https://dynamicbusiness.com/ai-tools/<https:/twitter.com/DynamicBusiness>), [Facebook](https://dynamicbusiness.com/ai-tools/<https:/www.facebook.com/dynamicbusiness/>) and [Instagram](https://dynamicbusiness.com/ai-tools/<https:/www.instagram.com/dynamicbusinessau/>).

SilkChart: Sales call analytics tool

Maziar Foroudian

February 17, 2025

SilkChart is a powerful business tool designed to help sales teams analyze sales calls and improve playbook adoption. Unlike traditional call recording tools, SilkChart goes a step further by providing insights and actionable feedback to both sales managers and reps. With features tailored specifically for B2B SaaS sales teams, SilkChart aims to optimize team performance and help individual sellers become more effective in their roles.

Features

  • Playbook: SilkChart allows teams to improve sales playbook adoption by choosing from proven playbooks or creating their own. Track playbook adoption for each rep and across calls, and use personalized scorecards to help reps address areas for improvement.
  • Insights: Optimize meeting performance by comparing reps’ responses to preferred answers, providing specific feedback for each call, and identifying key phrases that lead to successful conversions.
  • Team Analytics: Review more calls in less time with automatic call and rep surfacing, instant alerts for potential risks, and customizable summaries for each call.
  • AI Coach: Scale coaching across the team with AI-generated feedback for each call, including “What you could have said” suggestions to increase conversion rates.
  • Deal Health: SilkChart surfaces signals of deal health based on call analysis to help sales teams identify risks early and make informed decisions.
  • Built for B2B SaaS: SilkChart is the first sales call analysis tool tailored to the needs of B2B SaaS sales teams, providing benchmarks and insights specific to this industry.
  • Seamless Integrations: Enjoy effortless workflow with seamless integrations with calendars, meeting recording, and delivery of insights to email, Slack, or CRM.
  • For Sales Managers: Optimize team performance and save time with SilkChart’s comprehensive analysis and actionable insights.
  • For Individual Sellers: Improve sales skills and enhance performance with personalized recommendations and feedback from SilkChart.

In conclusion, SilkChart is a valuable tool for sales teams looking to enhance their sales call analysis, improve playbook adoption, and increase conversion rates. With its AI-powered coaching, team analytics, and deal health insights, SilkChart offers a comprehensive solution for optimizing sales performance in the B2B SaaS industry. Consider integrating SilkChart into your sales process to streamline operations, identify key opportunities for improvement, and ultimately drive success in your sales efforts.

Pricing

Starter plan: Free, includes unlimited calls and viewers, 10 calls per month. Pro plan billed annually at $19 per user/mo, includes unlimited calls, advanced team collaboration features. Enterprise plan for scaling teams, customized pricing with additional features like CRM integration and dedicated account manager.

Visit silkchart.com for more.

Keep up to date with our stories on LinkedIn, Twitter , Facebook and Instagram.

# New York Times is now using AI to edit stories
By [_Dwaipayan Roy_](https://www.newsbytesapp.com/news/science/new-york-times-integrates-ai-tools-into-newsroom-operations/<https:/www.newsbytesapp.com/author/dwaipayan/200>)
Feb 17, 2025 08:07 pm 
What's the story
_The New York Times_ has jumped on the [AI](https://www.newsbytesapp.com/news/science/new-york-times-integrates-ai-tools-into-newsroom-operations/<https:/www.newsbytesapp.com/news/science/artificial-intelligence-and-machine-learning>) bandwagon, launching tools to help with editing copies, summarizing information, coding, and writing. 
The publication has also created an internal AI tool, Echo, capable of summarizing articles and briefings. 
The move was announced through an internal email, which said both product and editorial staff will receive AI training.
Usage protocol
### New guidelines for AI tool usage
_NYT_ has released new editorial guidelines detailing the approved uses of Echo and other AI tools. 
The guidelines encourage staff to use these tools for suggesting edits, revisions, creating summaries, promotional copy for social media platforms, and SEO headlines. 
A training video was also shared with employees showing how AI can be used in tasks like developing news quizzes or suggesting interview questions.
Limitations
### Restrictions on AI usage in newsroom
_The NYT_ has also placed some restrictions on the use of AI in its newsroom. 
The company has asked staffers not to use AI for drafting or significantly altering an article, bypassing paywalls, including third-party copyrighted materials, or publishing AI-created images/videos without clear labeling. 
It remains unclear how far the publication will go with AI-edited copies in its published articles.
Human touch
### NYT's commitment to human journalism
Despite the use of AI, _The New York Times_ still wants to keep a human touch in its journalism. 
In a memo last year, the outlet promised that "Times journalism will always be reported, written and edited by our expert journalists." 
This promise was reiterated in the company's generative AI principles adopted in May 2024, stating that any generative AI use must start with facts vetted by their journalists.
Toolset expansion
### Other AI tools approved by The New York Times
Apart from Echo, _The New York Times_ has also approved a few other AI tools for use. 
These include GitHub Copilot as a programming assistant, NotebookLM, Google Vertex AI for product development, the NYT's ChatExplorer, [OpenAI](https://www.newsbytesapp.com/news/science/new-york-times-integrates-ai-tools-into-newsroom-operations/<https:/www.newsbytesapp.com/news/business/openai>)'s non-ChatGPT API, and some of Amazon's AI products. 
This expansion of the AI toolset comes as part of a broader trend among publications to incorporate more advanced tech into their operations.

    Home / News / Technology News / New York Times is now using AI to edit stories
    Next Article

    New York Times is now using AI to edit stories

    By Dwaipayan Roy
    Feb 17, 2025
    08:07 pm
    What's the story

    The New York Times has jumped on the AI bandwagon, launching tools to help with editing copies, summarizing information, coding, and writing.

    The publication has also created an internal AI tool, Echo, capable of summarizing articles and briefings.

    The move was announced through an internal email, which said both product and editorial staff will receive AI training.

    Usage protocol

    New guidelines for AI tool usage

    NYT has released new editorial guidelines detailing the approved uses of Echo and other AI tools.

    The guidelines encourage staff to use these tools for suggesting edits, revisions, creating summaries, promotional copy for social media platforms, and SEO headlines.

    A training video was also shared with employees showing how AI can be used in tasks like developing news quizzes or suggesting interview questions.

    Limitations

    Restrictions on AI usage in newsroom

    The NYT has also placed some restrictions on the use of AI in its newsroom.

    The company has asked staffers not to use AI for drafting or significantly altering an article, bypassing paywalls, including third-party copyrighted materials, or publishing AI-created images/videos without clear labeling.

    It remains unclear how far the publication will go with AI-edited copies in its published articles.

    Human touch

    NYT's commitment to human journalism

    Despite the use of AI, The New York Times still wants to keep a human touch in its journalism.

    In a memo last year, the outlet promised that "Times journalism will always be reported, written and edited by our expert journalists."

    This promise was reiterated in the company's generative AI principles adopted in May 2024, stating that any generative AI use must start with facts vetted by their journalists.

    Toolset expansion

    Other AI tools approved by The New York Times

    Apart from Echo, The New York Times has also approved a few other AI tools for use.

    These include GitHub Copilot as a programming assistant, NotebookLM, Google Vertex AI for product development, the NYT's ChatExplorer, OpenAI's non-ChatGPT API, and some of Amazon's AI products.

    This expansion of the AI toolset comes as part of a broader trend among publications to incorporate more advanced tech into their operations.

# Google Pay will soon allow UPI payments using your voice
By [_Dwaipayan Roy_](https://www.newsbytesapp.com/news/business/google-pay-to-introduce-ai-powered-voice-payments-in-india/<https:/www.newsbytesapp.com/author/dwaipayan/200>)
Feb 17, 2025 07:42 pm 
What's the story
[Google Pay](https://www.newsbytesapp.com/news/business/google-pay-to-introduce-ai-powered-voice-payments-in-india/<https:/www.newsbytesapp.com/news/business/google-pay>) is all set to transform the world of digital payments with a new AI-powered feature. 
The capability will enable users to make UPI payments via voice commands. 
The work is being done under the Bhashini AI project in collaboration with the [Indian government](https://www.newsbytesapp.com/news/business/google-pay-to-introduce-ai-powered-voice-payments-in-india/<https:/www.newsbytesapp.com/news/politics/indian-government>). The main goal of this effort is to simplify online transactions and make them more user-friendly.
User impact
### Voice feature to benefit illiterate users
The [AI](https://www.newsbytesapp.com/news/business/google-pay-to-introduce-ai-powered-voice-payments-in-india/<https:/www.newsbytesapp.com/news/science/artificial-intelligence-and-machine-learning>) voice feature would be especially useful for illiterate users, who might struggle with conventional online payment methods. 
Sharat Bulusu, Lead Product Manager of Google Pay in India, has said that he believes this new feature will make the digital payment process easier. 
However, exact details of how it would work are still not revealed by the company.
Language support
### It will support payments in local languages
The AI voice feature is being developed as part of the Bhashini AI project, a joint initiative between [Google](https://www.newsbytesapp.com/news/business/google-pay-to-introduce-ai-powered-voice-payments-in-india/<https:/www.newsbytesapp.com/news/science/google>) and the Indian government. 
The project aims to enable people to make payments in their local languages, further enhancing accessibility and convenience. 
However, an official launch date for this innovative feature has not been announced yet by Google Pay.
Security measures
### AI feature to combat cyber fraud
Along with simplifying transactions, Google is also using [machine learning](https://www.newsbytesapp.com/news/business/google-pay-to-introduce-ai-powered-voice-payments-in-india/<https:/www.newsbytesapp.com/news/science/artificial-intelligence-and-machine-learning>) and AI technologies to combat the growing problem of cyber fraud in the country. 
The company's new AI facility is expected to be a key player in keeping users safe from online scams and threats. 
This move highlights Google Pay's commitment not just to user convenience, but also to their security during digital transactions.

    Home / News / Business News / Google Pay will soon allow UPI payments using your voice
    Summarize
    Next Article

    Google Pay will soon allow UPI payments using your voice

    By Dwaipayan Roy
    Feb 17, 2025
    07:42 pm
    What's the story

    Google Pay is all set to transform the world of digital payments with a new AI-powered feature.

    The capability will enable users to make UPI payments via voice commands.

    The work is being done under the Bhashini AI project in collaboration with the Indian government. The main goal of this effort is to simplify online transactions and make them more user-friendly.

    User impact

    Voice feature to benefit illiterate users

    The AI voice feature would be especially useful for illiterate users, who might struggle with conventional online payment methods.

    Sharat Bulusu, Lead Product Manager of Google Pay in India, has said that he believes this new feature will make the digital payment process easier.

    However, exact details of how it would work are still not revealed by the company.

    Language support

    It will support payments in local languages

    The AI voice feature is being developed as part of the Bhashini AI project, a joint initiative between Google and the Indian government.

    The project aims to enable people to make payments in their local languages, further enhancing accessibility and convenience.

    However, an official launch date for this innovative feature has not been announced yet by Google Pay.

    Security measures

    AI feature to combat cyber fraud

    Along with simplifying transactions, Google is also using machine learning and AI technologies to combat the growing problem of cyber fraud in the country.

    The company's new AI facility is expected to be a key player in keeping users safe from online scams and threats.

    This move highlights Google Pay's commitment not just to user convenience, but also to their security during digital transactions.

# XRP News Today: XRP Spot ETF Application Noticed By SEC, Meanwhile Yeti Ouro Enters New Stage
[5 hours ago](https://bitcoinethereumnews.com/tech/xrp-news-today-xrp-spot-etf-application-noticed-by-sec-meanwhile-yeti-ouro-enters-new-stage/<https:/bitcoinethereumnews.com/tech/xrp-news-today-xrp-spot-etf-application-noticed-by-sec-meanwhile-yeti-ouro-enters-new-stage/> "XRP News Today: XRP Spot ETF Application Noticed By SEC, Meanwhile Yeti Ouro Enters New Stage")
[Bitcoin Ethereum News](https://bitcoinethereumnews.com/tech/xrp-news-today-xrp-spot-etf-application-noticed-by-sec-meanwhile-yeti-ouro-enters-new-stage/<https:/bitcoinethereumnews.com/author/bitcoin-ethereum-news/>)
![](https://bitcoinethereumnews.com/tech/xrp-news-today-xrp-spot-etf-application-noticed-by-sec-meanwhile-yeti-ouro-enters-new-stage/?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=xrp-news-today-xrp-spot-etf-application-noticed-by-sec-meanwhile-yeti-ouro-enters-new-stage)
The crypto market is on fire as the SEC notices a potential XRP spot ETF application. While XRP holders are hopeful about what this means for the token, another project is flying under the radar. Yeti Ouro (YETIO), a Play-to-Earn (P2E) gaming token, is getting ready to go to the moon and has just entered into Stage 3 of its presale. 
## The SEC Acknowledges XRP ETF Applications
The main reason for XRP’s price rise is the SEC’s approval of Grayscale’s application to convert its XRP Trust into an ETF. This is a big deal because the SEC’s formal acknowledgment of the filing starts the review process, during which they will decide to approve or deny the ETF. XRP price is up over 9% in less than 24 hours, sitting around the $2.81 mark at the time of writing.
If approved, an XRP ETF would give institutional investors a regulated way to get exposure to XRP and increase mainstream adoption and liquidity. While this is a good sign, the SEC still has a few months to review the application before they make a decision.
However, another coin is currently gaining attention, with strong performance during its ongoing presale.
## YETI OURO (YETIO)
Yeti Ouro is shaping up to be one of the top investments of 2025, with an explosive presale, a groundbreaking P2E game, and strong tokenomics
Yeti Ouro’s presale has already seen strong traction with over 200 million tokens sold and has moved into Stage 3 of its presale at the price of $0.024 per token granting early investors a return exceeding 100%. This isn’t just hype, Yeti Ouro’s fundamentals are solid. 
SolidProof has fully audited the smart contract, so it’s clear Yeti Ouro is a project that takes security seriously. With 50% of the 1 billion token supply allocated to presale buyers, demand is growing fast as people try to get in before the price goes up.
Beyond the presale success, Yeti Ouro stands out because of its unique approach to blockchain gaming. Its flagship game Yeti Go is a racing game built with Unreal Engine 5. Unlike many Play-to-Earn (P2E) projects that struggle to balance fun with earning potential, Yeti Go delivers a great gaming experience while offering real financial incentives.
Players can earn, trade and sell YETIO tokens based on their in-game achievements, creating real value in a way traditional gaming can’t. This dual focus on fun and financial gain means consistent demand for YETIO and long term growth.
Developed with support from the studio behind Call of Duty, The Witcher, Dead Space, and Spider-Man, this high-octane racing experience features destructible tracks and adaptive AI opponents. The audio design is being expertly crafted by industry professionals with Grammy-nominated experience, having worked on projects for Major Lazer, Vybz Kartel, and Kabaka Pyramid.
## How High The Price Could Go

Bitcoin Ethereum News

The crypto market is on fire as the SEC notices a potential XRP spot ETF application. While XRP holders are hopeful about what this means for the token, another project is flying under the radar. Yeti Ouro (YETIO), a Play-to-Earn (P2E) gaming token, is getting ready to go to the moon and has just entered into Stage 3 of its presale.

XRP price is up over 9% in less than 24 hours, sitting around the $2.81 mark at the time of writing.

If approved, an XRP ETF would give institutional investors a regulated way to get exposure to XRP and increase mainstream adoption and liquidity. While this is a good sign, the SEC still has a few months to review the application before they make a decision.

However, another coin is currently gaining attention, with strong performance during its ongoing presale.

YETI OURO (YETIO)

Yeti Ouro is shaping up to be one of the top investments of 2025, with an explosive presale, a groundbreaking P2E game, and strong tokenomics

Yeti Ouro’s presale has already seen strong traction with over 200 million tokens sold and has moved into Stage 3 of its presale at the price of $0.024 per token granting early investors a return exceeding 100%. This isn’t just hype, Yeti Ouro’s fundamentals are solid. 

SolidProof has fully audited the smart contract, so it’s clear Yeti Ouro is a project that takes security seriously. With 50% of the 1 billion token supply allocated to presale buyers, demand is growing fast as people try to get in before the price goes up.

Beyond the presale success, Yeti Ouro stands out because of its unique approach to blockchain gaming. Its flagship game Yeti Go is a racing game built with Unreal Engine 5. Unlike many Play-to-Earn (P2E) projects that struggle to balance fun with earning potential, Yeti Go delivers a great gaming experience while offering real financial incentives.

Players can earn, trade and sell YETIO tokens based on their in-game achievements, creating real value in a way traditional gaming can’t. This dual focus on fun and financial gain means consistent demand for YETIO and long term growth.

Developed with support from the studio behind Call of Duty, The Witcher, Dead Space, and Spider-Man, this high-octane racing experience features destructible tracks and adaptive AI opponents. The audio design is being expertly crafted by industry professionals with Grammy-nominated experience, having worked on projects for Major Lazer, Vybz Kartel, and Kabaka Pyramid.

How High The Price Could Go

The hype around Yeti Ouro is getting real. Market analysts predict YETIO could reach $5 by the end of 2025, from a current presale price of $0.024. If that happens the returns will be crazy. A small $500 investment today could turn into just over $104,000.

This is not just hype. Yeti Ouro’s tokenomics are designed for long term price appreciation. The deflationary model has a built-in burn mechanism that reduces supply, and Yeti Go’s in-game economy ensures utility for the token. As more players join the ecosystem and demand for YETIO increases, basic supply and demand could push the price up big time.

The team has also positioned the project perfectly. Unlike many Play-to-Earn (P2E) games that only appeal to a niche audience, Yeti Go targets both gamers and investors, combining the best of entertainment and financial opportunity. This broad appeal means Yeti Ouro is set for long term growth as blockchain gaming goes mainstream.

Conclusion

While XRP’s ETF is getting all the headlines, the real opportunity for big growth might be with Yeti Ouro. The presale is a rare chance to invest at a price that could yield big returns if the project delivers. 

With strong tokenomics, a great P2E game and bullish price predictions, Yeti Ouro is looking like one of the best crypto investments of 2025.

For investors looking for a project with both immediate and long term potential, Yeti Ouro’s gaming innovation and financial upside makes it one to watch. The clock is ticking on the presale and those who act now could be setting themselves up for gains of a lifetime.

With AI adoption expanding in blockchain applications, Bittensor remains a project that could benefit from the sector’s growth.

While some expect it to surpass $2.20, the key support at $0.89 remains crucial for its next move.

With Bitcoin Ordinals and smart contract integration fueling demand, Stacks aims to enhance Bitcoin’s utility beyond just a store of value. For those tracking Stacks price prediction, its ability to sustain momentum and attract developers to its ecosystem will play a significant role in determining its long-term strength.

Both projects are making moves, but the real shift is happening in blockchain-powered commerce.

While traditional platforms like Amazon and Alibaba still rely on Web2 models with high fees and limited user control, Web3Bay is building the future with a decentralized, low-cost marketplace. Its presale has already raised over $1.4 million, and with a structured price increase, it’s shaping up as the best crypto to buy now in blockchain e-commerce. As adoption accelerates, Web3Bay is positioning itself as the first mover in Web3 shopping, offering a new way to buy and sell online.

With these features, analysts predict FloppyPepe could become one of the most profitable cryptos this week, offering investors and whales over 100% returns. There’s also more to the tokens’ growth potential. 
The project’s deflationary mechanism burns 1% of every transaction, guaranteeing long-term value appreciation. Additionally, a portion of each trade is redistributed to holders, creating constant income opportunities. Whales eager to enjoy this continuous income opportunity are actively buying the FloppyPepe token. In just 24 hours, the project made close to $1 million in its private presale.

Hot picks of the week for massive gains: DOGE, PEPE, and FPPE

February 17, 2025 at 6:00 pm
Sponsored
Sponsored

Share

Disclosure: This article does not represent investment advice. The content and materials featured on this page are for educational purposes only.

Whales accumulate FloppyPepe, Dogecoin, and Pepe as FPPE emerges as a top meme coin with 1,000% growth potential.

Table of Contents

  • FloppyPepe: The rising meme coin whales are buying for 1,000% gains
  • Dogecoin: Gaining momentum with strong whale accumulation
  • Pepe: Whale accumulation signals strong comeback
  • Conclusion

Currently, whales are accumulating Pepe (PEPE), Dogecoin (DOGE), and FloppyPepe (FPPE), a rising meme coin with the potential to deliver over 1,000% returns.

This week began on a rough note for the crypto market, with many cryptos experiencing sharp declines. Investors are always eager to know which cryptos whales buy to recoup their losses. True to form, these market-moving giants are already making strategic plays that could shape trends for 2025. 

FloppyPepe: The rising meme coin whales are buying for 1,000% gains

Topping the list of cryptos that whales are accumulating this week is FloppyPepe. This emerging meme coin delivers real utility through NFT monetization, staking rewards, decentralized governance, and wildlife conservation efforts. One of its standout features is the AI-powered “Meme-o-Matic.”

This tool enables users to create memes, mint NFTs, and trade them on platforms like OpenSea and Rarible, transforming humour into profit. With these features, analysts predict FloppyPepe could become one of the most profitable cryptos this week, offering investors and whales over 100% returns. There’s also more to the tokens’ growth potential. 

The project’s deflationary mechanism burns 1% of every transaction, guaranteeing long-term value appreciation. Additionally, a portion of each trade is redistributed to holders, creating constant income opportunities. Whales eager to enjoy this continuous income opportunity are actively buying the FloppyPepe token. In just 24 hours, the project made close to $1 million in its private presale. 

Furthermore, to reinforce its stability, the project’s smart contract has been audited by Solidproof, ensuring security and reliability. Plans are also in place to expand to Binance Smart Chain and Solana Cloud, which could significantly boost adoption and drive substantial growth. With this bullish outlook and rising whales activity, experts predict this token to surge by 1,000%, potentially surpassing Dogecoin and Pepe, making now the ideal time to buy FloppyPepe at its current price of $0.0000002.

You might also like: FloppyPepe set to surge as AI meme generation dominates crypto markets

Dogecoin: Gaining momentum with strong whale accumulation

Dogecoin is next on the list of top cryptos whales are buying this week. The token has been gaining momentum as it holds a key support level. Crypto analyst Chandler recently shared a detailed Dogecoin price analysis on X (formerly Twitter), using Fibonacci time zones and retracement levels to forecast its next moves. He highlighted the 0.236 Fibonacci time zone, noting that Dogecoin has historically surged after crossing this line. 

Based on this pattern, Chandler predicts Dogecoin will break past this time zone around March 24, 2025. He also suggests that the price could reclaim its all-time high of $0.73. With this bullish outlook and growing interest from whales, now could be a prime opportunity to accumulate Dogecoin.

Pepe: Whale accumulation signals strong comeback

Pepe is also among the top cryptos whales are buying this week. A month ago, the Pepe coin was trading at $0.000021, but it saw a sharp 55% decline in the following weeks. However, the token has recently rebounded. From an on-chain perspective, the Pepe price correction coincided with a significant drop in user activity. 

According to Santiment, the price-Daily Active Addresses (DAA) divergence was negative between January 10 and February 7. However, this metric has now turned positive, signaling renewed interest as participation increases. If this trend continues, the token could see further gains. No wonder whales are actively accumulating Pepe this week.

Conclusion

Although Dogecoin and Pepe are strong contenders, crypto whales prefer FloppyPepe. Unlike these cryptos, this new project goes beyond speculation by integrating AI to offer real-world utility in the meme coin market. 

The project also offers small investors and whales special rewards, including airdrops and free NFTs, when users successfully refer their friends. These NFTs can then be minted for profit worth thousands of dollars, adding an extra incentive to participate. So, for investors, FloppyPepe presents the next big opportunity in the crypto market for a low price after high returns and tangible utility.

To learn more about FloppyPepe, visit the website, whitepaper, Telegram, and Twitter.

Sponsored Share

Disclosure: This article does not represent investment advice. The content and materials featured on this page are for educational purposes only.

Whales accumulate FloppyPepe, Dogecoin, and Pepe as FPPE emerges as a top meme coin with 1,000% growth potential.

Table of Contents

Currently, whales are accumulating Pepe (PEPE), Dogecoin (DOGE), and FloppyPepe (FPPE), a rising meme coin with the potential to deliver over 1,000% returns.

This week began on a rough note for the crypto market, with many cryptos experiencing sharp declines. Investors are always eager to know which cryptos whales buy to recoup their losses. True to form, these market-moving giants are already making strategic plays that could shape trends for 2025.

FloppyPepe: The rising meme coin whales are buying for 1,000% gains

Topping the list of cryptos that whales are accumulating this week is FloppyPepe. This emerging meme coin delivers real utility through NFT monetization, staking rewards, decentralized governance, and wildlife conservation efforts. One of its standout features is the AI-powered “Meme-o-Matic.”

This tool enables users to create memes, mint NFTs, and trade them on platforms like OpenSea and Rarible, transforming humour into profit. With these features, analysts predict FloppyPepe could become one of the most profitable cryptos this week, offering investors and whales over 100% returns. There’s also more to the tokens’ growth potential.

The project’s deflationary mechanism burns 1% of every transaction, guaranteeing long-term value appreciation. Additionally, a portion of each trade is redistributed to holders, creating constant income opportunities. Whales eager to enjoy this continuous income opportunity are actively buying the FloppyPepe token. In just 24 hours, the project made close to $1 million in its private presale.

Furthermore, to reinforce its stability, the project’s smart contract has been audited by Solidproof, ensuring security and reliability. Plans are also in place to expand to Binance Smart Chain and Solana Cloud, which could significantly boost adoption and drive substantial growth. With this bullish outlook and rising whales activity, experts predict this token to surge by 1,000%, potentially surpassing Dogecoin and Pepe, making now the ideal time to buy FloppyPepe at its current price of $0.0000002.

Dogecoin: Gaining momentum with strong whale accumulation

Dogecoin is next on the list of top cryptos whales are buying this week. The token has been gaining momentum as it holds a key support level. Crypto analyst Chandler recently shared a detailed Dogecoin price analysis on X (formerly Twitter), using Fibonacci time zones and retracement levels to forecast its next moves. He highlighted the 0.236 Fibonacci time zone, noting that Dogecoin has historically surged after crossing this line.

Based on this pattern, Chandler predicts Dogecoin will break past this time zone around March 24, 2025. He also suggests that the price could reclaim its all-time high of $0.73. With this bullish outlook and growing interest from whales, now could be a prime opportunity to accumulate Dogecoin.

Pepe: Whale accumulation signals strong comeback

Pepe is also among the top cryptos whales are buying this week. A month ago, the Pepe coin was trading at $0.000021, but it saw a sharp 55% decline in the following weeks. However, the token has recently rebounded. From an on-chain perspective, the Pepe price correction coincided with a significant drop in user activity.

According to Santiment, the price-Daily Active Addresses (DAA) divergence was negative between January 10 and February 7. However, this metric has now turned positive, signaling renewed interest as participation increases. If this trend continues, the token could see further gains. No wonder whales are actively accumulating Pepe this week.

Conclusion

Although Dogecoin and Pepe are strong contenders, crypto whales prefer FloppyPepe. Unlike these cryptos, this new project goes beyond speculation by integrating AI to offer real-world utility in the meme coin market.

The project also offers small investors and whales special rewards, including airdrops and free NFTs, when users successfully refer their friends. These NFTs can then be minted for profit worth thousands of dollars, adding an extra incentive to participate. So, for investors, FloppyPepe presents the next big opportunity in the crypto market for a low price after high returns and tangible utility.

To learn more about FloppyPepe, visit the website , whitepaper , Telegram , and Twitter .

#  BITCOIN PRICE ANALYSIS & PREDICTION (February 17) –Bitcoin Remains Trapped Under $100k, Yet to Signal Next Move 
[ 0](https://nulltx.com/bitcoin-price-analysis-prediction-february-17-bitcoin-remains-trapped-under-100k-yet-to-signal-next-move/<https:/nulltx.com/bitcoin-price-analysis-prediction-february-17-bitcoin-remains-trapped-under-100k-yet-to-signal-next-move/#disqus_thread>)
By [Michael Fasogbon](https://nulltx.com/bitcoin-price-analysis-prediction-february-17-bitcoin-remains-trapped-under-100k-yet-to-signal-next-move/<https:/nulltx.com/author/michaelbolaji/> "Posts by Michael Fasogbon") on  February 17, 2025 [Market Analysis](https://nulltx.com/bitcoin-price-analysis-prediction-february-17-bitcoin-remains-trapped-under-100k-yet-to-signal-next-move/<https:/nulltx.com/category/market-analysis/>)
**[Bitcoin](https://nulltx.com/bitcoin-price-analysis-prediction-february-17-bitcoin-remains-trapped-under-100k-yet-to-signal-next-move/<https:/nulltx.com/tag/bitcoin/>) remained trapped in a consolidation despite several attempts to move out. It has posted a slight loss today due to a rejection. Failure to retake $100k could result to an extension of the bearish momentum.**
Bitcoin’s price went a bit offensive last week after recovering from the $91k level in the preceding week. The movement came with multiple rejections due to weakness and it consolidated throughout that week.
The price dropped and closed yesterday bearishly after failing to reclaim the $100k mark last week. This mark level has not just become an obstacle for the bulls in the past weeks but a crucial resistance level.
Currently, the price is weak on the day following a 1% drop in the last 24 hours. A continuous decrease could cause a serious breakdown while trading calmly on the day. Currently, supply looks low at the moment.
However, if the bulls return with a strong commitment this week, we may see a strong close above the crucial mark level. A further increase there should signal a new bullish phase in the near term.
Looking at the daily chart, the market looks dicey as the next major price move is yet to be ascertained. Technically, Bitcoin is still under the bears’ radar on the short-term. The market should move in their favour if they mount pressure.
## **BTC’s Key Levels To Watch**
![](https://nulltx.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/tBzUj67C-1024x581.png)
Source: [Tradingview](https://nulltx.com/bitcoin-price-analysis-prediction-february-17-bitcoin-remains-trapped-under-100k-yet-to-signal-next-move/<https:/www.tradingview.com/x/tBzUj67C/>)
The $94k level is considered support to watch for Bitcoin’s next dip, followed by the $91,000 level. If they fail to contain selling pressure, we may see a breakdown straight to the $85k support.
Towards the upside, there’s a resistance at $99,550. Flipping through the crucial $100k mark could rally us to $103,278 and potentially $109,558 – where a major breakout lies.
Key Resistance Levels: $99,550, $103,278, $109,558
Key Support Levels: $94,000, $91,000, $85,000
  * **Spot Price: $96,243**
  * **Trend: Bearish**
  * **Volatility: Low**

content.text:
Bitcoin remained trapped in a consolidation despite several attempts to move out. It has posted a slight loss today due to a rejection. Failure to retake $100k could result to an extension of the bearish momentum.

Bitcoin’s price went a bit offensive last week after recovering from the $91k level in the preceding week. The movement came with multiple rejections due to weakness and it consolidated throughout that week.

The price dropped and closed yesterday bearishly after failing to reclaim the $100k mark last week. This mark level has not just become an obstacle for the bulls in the past weeks but a crucial resistance level.

Currently, the price is weak on the day following a 1% drop in the last 24 hours. A continuous decrease could cause a serious breakdown while trading calmly on the day. Currently, supply looks low at the moment.

However, if the bulls return with a strong commitment this week, we may see a strong close above the crucial mark level. A further increase there should signal a new bullish phase in the near term.

Looking at the daily chart, the market looks dicey as the next major price move is yet to be ascertained. Technically, Bitcoin is still under the bears’ radar on the short-term. The market should move in their favour if they mount pressure.

BTC’s Key Levels To Watch

Source: Tradingview

The $94k level is considered support to watch for Bitcoin’s next dip, followed by the $91,000 level. If they fail to contain selling pressure, we may see a breakdown straight to the $85k support.

Towards the upside, there’s a resistance at $99,550. Flipping through the crucial $100k mark could rally us to $103,278 and potentially $109,558 – where a major breakout lies.

Key Resistance Levels: $99,550, $103,278, $109,558

Key Support Levels: $94,000, $91,000, $85,000

Managing assets across multiple blockchains has always been a challenge. Qubetics solves this problem by offering a truly decentralized and non-custodial multi-chain wallet, allowing users to seamlessly manage, swap, and transfer assets across different networks without the need for intermediaries.
Qubetics’ Web3 aggregated approach ensures full interoperability with leading blockchain networks, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, Polkadot, and Avalanche. This means that users can interact with multiple ecosystems through a single, secure interface, eliminating the need for multiple wallets. The platform is also integrated with decentralized exchanges (DEXs) and cross-chain bridges, making asset transfers faster, cheaper, and more secure.
For everyday crypto users, this means having complete control over their funds while being able to move assets between chains instantly. For institutional investors and businesses, Qubetics provides a scalable and secure solution for managing multi-chain digital assets. As Web3 adoption accelerates, the demand for cross-chain compatibility and self-custody solutions will continue to grow, making Qubetics a top crypto to hold long-term.

## **2. Quant – The Ultimate Blockchain Interoperability Solution**
Quant is a blockchain interoperability solution that enables seamless communication between multiple networks. The project’s Overledger technology allows enterprises, banks, and developers to connect different blockchains without requiring them to modify their existing infrastructure.
With partnerships in finance, healthcare, and supply chain management, Quant’s long-term potential is massive. As more businesses and institutions look for ways to integrate blockchain technology into their existing systems, Quant is expected to play a significant role in the industry’s future.
## **3. Aptos – A Next-Gen Layer 1 Blockchain**
Aptos is a high-speed Layer 1 blockchain designed for scalability, security, and developer-friendly smart contract execution. Unlike traditional blockchains, Aptos uses a unique programming language called Move, which enhances transaction efficiency and security.
The project has seen significant backing from major crypto investors, and with its advanced proof-of-stake consensus mechanism, Aptos is poised to become one of the best long-term crypto investments.

EOS was one of the earliest projects to prioritize scalability and low-fee transactions, making it an attractive platform for decentralized applications (dApps). While the project faced early setbacks, recent upgrades and governance improvements have revived investor interest.
As more developers seek alternatives to Ethereum due to gas fees and scalability concerns, EOS is re-emerging as a strong competitor in the blockchain space. Its high-speed transactions and low costs make it a top choice for dApps and gaming platforms, securing its place as a long-term crypto investment.
## **5. Astra – A Rising Star in AI and Web3 Integration**
Astra is a new entrant in the AI and Web3 space, focusing on AI-powered automation, decentralized finance, and cross-chain smart contracts. Its native token is being used for governance, staking, and transaction fees, making it a multi-utility asset with long-term potential.

## **6. Theta – The Future of Decentralized Video Streaming**
Theta Network is revolutionizing video streaming by using blockchain to decentralize content delivery. The project incentivizes users to share bandwidth and computing power, reducing costs for streaming platforms while improving video quality.
With partnerships with Samsung, Google, and other major tech giants, Theta is becoming a major player in the video streaming industry. As Web3 adoption grows, Theta’s decentralized content delivery model could position it as one of the best cryptos to hold long-term.

The crypto market continues to evolve, and long-term investors are looking for projects with strong fundamentals and real-world applications. Qubetics, Quant, Aptos, EOS, Astra, and Theta stand out as some of the best cryptos to hold long-term, offering a mix of interoperability, scalability, decentralized applications, and real-world utility.
